name: Risotto with Radicchio and Sea Scallops
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat the oil in a medium frying pan over high heat. Fry the scallops until barely golden (2 minutes).
2. Season with salt and set aside.
3. Bring the broth to the boil then kept warm over a low heat.
4.  Melt 3 tbsp butter in a large heavy pan over a medium heat.
5. When the butter begins to foam add the onions. Cook until pale yellow and soft (4 - 5 minutes).
6. Add the rice, stir to coat with the butter, and cook until it turns white (2 minutes).
7. Add the wine and stir until absorbed.
8. Add the radicchio and a ladle of stock and stir until the broth has been absorbed.
9. Continue adding the stock a ladle at a time, stirring to absorb before adding the next.
10. Add the scallops and their juices and mix well.
11. Add a knob of butter. Mix and season.
